humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that the right breast tumor measures 1.1 cm and the left breast tumor measures 0.9 cm. Based on the rules provided, T1 tumors are 2 cm or less in size. Therefore, both the right and left breast tumors are T1 stage tumors.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In the report provided, the tumor in the right breast measures 1.1 cm (C. Right Breast, Diagnosis) and the tumor in the left breast measures 0.9 cm (F. Left Breast, Diagnosis). Both measurements fall under T1, which refers to a tumor that is 2 cm or less in size. Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T1.
